resources.string: Tap button and enter correct\npasswordto unlock data
Save your encrypted data to external storage for back up
Read encrypted data from external storage then append to list
Delete encrypted data from internal store. You need this when you forget your password
Email encrypted data to back up
This application is written for my wife, Mandy. She uses this application to store her website strong password. Moreover, she is the project manager of this application.
My cat, Hulu, is the co-worker of this application. She always tries its best to interrupt my work. Sometimes she type something but all of that are not buildable, so I never commit those stuffs.
